welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Falmouth, Jamaica! Get ready to experience the vibrant culture, beautiful beaches, and warm hospitality that this charming city is known for. We invite you to immerse yourself in all that Falmouth has to offer and make unforgettable memories during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sangster International Airport serves both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Sangster International Airport is dedicated to international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Sangster International Airport is dedicated to domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
